name: Life Of Jesus Christ Color Jigsaw Puzzle 100 Piece
name_original: Life Of Jesus Christ Color Jigsaw Puzzle 100 Piece
description:
Jesus Christ & Christianity jigsaw puzzle for kids and adults has been developed especially for all age. this game helps your kids develop matching, tactile and fine motor skills while playing and learn about Christianity. exercise your brain for hours now!

features:
- 20 awesome pictures and other in the various images such as realistic,cartoon and drawings etc.
- 3 levels to play: 25 pieces, 49 pieces and 100 pieces
- the game has child-friendly interface, is easy to use, and fun to play!
- solve button can help you to complete

how to play:
1. choose jigsaw pieces level
2. when complete jigsaw, you will receive star and coin for buy new pictures
